title: New Zwift Annual Plans are Like Getting 2 Months Free
content:
Starting today, Zwift has annual plans that let you pay once per year for a discounted rate, effectively giving you two months free when compared to paying monthly.

The annual rate is $149.99 + tax in the United States, £129.99 in the United Kingdom, and €149.99 in the European Union. No word on other markets, but that’s 10x the $14.99 USD monthly rate. Monthly plans are still available at the regular price.

Oh, and the Zwift Hub Classic is now a KICKR Core?

In other news, we noticed that the link to the Zwift Hub Classic trainer now goes to a page offering the Wahoo KICKR Core. Perhaps that’s the result of the two brands settling an IP infringement lawsuit so quickly, and why Zwift is now focused on their Hub One trainer with the Zwift Cog and virtual shifting.
